Crashing Players.Description: Doing this on purpose will get you banned

Violating Roblox's ToS.Description: Failing to follow Roblox's ToS and the game rules will get you banned

Bannable guis.Description: Guis like UTG or Infinite Yield are not allowed

Banned assets.Description: Running banned require/asset(s) ids outside the sandbox

Admin Loaders.Description: Admin modules like HD Admin, Adonis, Quantum, Kohls are not allowed

Offensive scripts.Description: Running any Offensive scripts that are related to real life situations

Chat Manipulation.Description: Chat Manipulation is strictly not allowed

Flashy Scripts.Description: Loading scripts that have intense flashes may be uncomfortable for other players

Refusing to stop.Description: If a person gets mass killed and asks you multiple times to stop, not doing so will get you warned or banned

Harassment.Description: Any type of harassment, doxxing, and stalking will not be tolerated

Remote Admins.Description: Loading Remote Admin(s) and letting others run bad commands or anything similar is not allowed. The person who loaded the admin may be warned or banned depending on the situation

Blocking Services from working.Description: We do not allow blocking services from working how they are supposed to, failing to follow any warnings from the moderators will get you banned
